snippet: ROGERS--Wayne M. The staff at Kleinfeld Bridal is deeply saddened by the death of its Chairman, Wayne Rogers. From the 1990's to the present, Wayne in partnership with Ronald Rothstein and Mara Urshel, built Kleinfeld into the most successful designer bridal retailer in the world. He helped expand the Kleinfeld name into 150 countries through the hit "Say Yes to the Dress" TV show and he licensed the brand to HBC for Canada. Wayne followed no rules, no industry practices and believed one always had to enjoy the freedom of free thought with no boundaries. Wayne loved Kleinfeld and its success, its dedicated staff and its brides. His personal charm and caring nature was a blessing to everyone who worked at Kleinfeld. We extend our sincere and heartfelt condolences to Amy, Laura, Bill and their families. He will be truly missed. Ronald R. Rothstein and Mara Urshel 1/3
lead_paragraph: ROGERS--Wayne M. The staff at Kleinfeld Bridal is deeply saddened by the death of its Chairman, Wayne Rogers. From the 1990's to the present, Wayne in partnership with Ronald Rothstein and Mara Urshel, built Kleinfeld into the most successful designer bridal retailer in the world. He helped expand the Kleinfeld name into 150 countries through the hit "Say Yes to the Dress" TV show and he licensed the brand to HBC for Canada. Wayne followed no rules, no industry practices and believed one always had to enjoy the freedom of free thought with no boundaries. Wayne loved Kleinfeld and its success, its dedicated staff and its brides. His personal charm and caring nature was a blessing to everyone who worked at Kleinfeld. We extend our sincere and heartfelt condolences to Amy, Laura, Bill and their families. He will be truly missed. Ronald R. Rothstein and Mara Urshel 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  ROGERS, WAYNE M
